sub_title: MASTER/SDPO IMR DP3 - Available for job
summary:
In the Offshore Industry, I am working since 2003, and have served as Master/DPO on Platform Supply, R.O.V. Support and IMR vessels.

During that time I have gained experience in different kind of offshore support work, from simple supply tasks, to anchor handling and towing, ROV inspections and subsea installation, 3D and 4D seismic survey.
This includes experience in boat handling on Z-drive, CPP, Clutch and Azimuthal propulsions.

At present, I work as Master of IMR  DP3 vessel engaged in ROV / Construction, offshore West Africa. 

I am familiar with all of the international conventions concerning maritime industry, i.e. ISM, ISPS, SOLAS, MARPOL, etc. and implementation of those on scene in everyday work. I have very high safety, environment and working standards and have been trying to improve them with education and experience.

I look at my self as team player and self-starter, willing to learn and face new challenges.
